# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an instance of the critical messenger object.

## Declaration

```swift
override dynamic init()
```

## Discussion

Don’t use this initializer directly, create an instance of [doc://com.apple.messages/documentation/Messages/MSCriticalSMSMessenger] instead.
title: init()
